documentclassifier.Metriche
Class BhattacharryaDistanceComparator

java.lang.Object
  documentclassifier.Metriche.BhattacharryaDistanceComparator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Comparator<java.util.Map.Entry<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>>>
public class BhattacharryaDistanceComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<java.util.Map.Entry<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>>>

This class implements the Bhattacharrya distance, using as the weighting function for the terms of each document the relative frequency, already calculated during the generation of each document's histogram.

It implements the interface Comparator, on elements of type Entry, Map>, each one containing information on single documents of the training set. Using the information present in each entry, the Comparator orders the training set's documents on their Bhattacharrya distance to the query document.

Author:
Salvo Danilo Giuffrida (salvod.giuffrida@gmail.com)
See Also:
Comparator

Method Detail

compare

public int compare(java.util.Map.Entry<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>> A,
                   java.util.Map.Entry<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>> B)
Method that implements the interface Comparator, to compare two documents whose Bhattacharrya distance to the query document has been calculated.

The comparation then is done using this metric, whose value has been calculated previously, using the static method calculateDistance, and returning in accordance the value 1, 0 or -1.

This method gets called for each possible pair of documents in the training set.

Specified by:
compare in interface java.util.Comparator<java.util.Map.Entry<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>>>
Parameters:
A - The 1st document to compare.
B - The 2nd document to compare.
Returns:
An integer between these 3 possible values: -1, 0 or 1, representing the ordering between the 1st and the 2nd input document.

calculateDistance

public static void calculateDistance(java.util.LinkedList<java.util.Map.Entry<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>>> documentSet,
                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> query)
Static method used for calculation of the Bhattacharrya distance, between each document of a set (represented by a vector that for each document's term contains its relative frequency), and a reference document (query).

Parameters:
documentSet - A set of documents, represented with a list of instances of the class Entry, Map>, whose key is a map String->Object, containing information on a document, and whose value is a map String->Double, which represents the histogram of terms of the document (after pre-processing).
query - The histogram of the query document all the cosines refer to. It is implemented by a map, that associates keys of type String to elements of type Double.
